trans-unit.source: Provides a simple listener that directs logging output to file.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个简单的侦听器，用于将日志记录输出指引至文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class provides automated maintenance capabilities to archive log files as needed, on a daily or per-application basis.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类提供了自动的维护功能存档日志文件，根据需要在每天或每个应用程序上。

trans-unit.source: This automatic archival functionality helps reduce the maintenance responsibilities of developers and administrators.
trans-unit.target: 此自动存档功能可帮助减少开发人员和管理员的维护责任。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> can be added to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collections to redirect output from logging to a text file.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>可以添加到<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合将从日志记录到文本文件的输出重定向。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class can also be added to `My.Application.Log` or `My.Log` (for Web applications) in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实例还可以添加到`My.Application.Log`或`My.Log`（对于 Web 应用程序） 中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.`
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 更改其中 My.Application.Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.`

trans-unit.source: The main features of this class are:
trans-unit.target: 此类的主要功能如下：

trans-unit.source: *Archival functionality*.
trans-unit.target: *存档功能*。

trans-unit.source: The log files generated by this class are named according to the base name and the date, along with a number to distinguish the log file from successive versions of the log.
trans-unit.target: 按照基本名称和日期，以及要将日志文件与日志的后续版本区分开来的数字，此类由生成的日志文件进行命名。

trans-unit.source: New log files are created on an as-needed basis.
trans-unit.target: 基于根据需要创建新的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The explicit form of the file name is `baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`version`].log, where:
trans-unit.target: 文件名称的显式格式是`baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`version`].log，其中：

trans-unit.source: The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `baseName`一部分是基本的日志名称，指定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> is <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>.
trans-unit.target: `dateStamp`一部分采用格式"YYYY-月-日"，它将显示当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>。

trans-unit.source: If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `version` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个日志文件需要具有相同`baseName`和`dateStamp`、`version`部件，一个正`Integer`，添加到的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: *Multiple class instances*.
trans-unit.target: *多个类实例*。

trans-unit.source: If an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class writes to a file that is in use:
trans-unit.target: 实例时，如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类写入正在使用的文件：

trans-unit.source: The class shares the file if it is being used by another instance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class in the same process.
trans-unit.target: 如果它正在由另一个实例的类都将共享文件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>在同一进程中的类。

trans-unit.source: The class creates a new log file using the next available name if the file is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 类创建一个新的日志文件，如果该文件正由另一个进程使用下一个可用名称。

trans-unit.source: *Thread safety*.
trans-unit.target: *线程安全*。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to safely write messages to the log from multiple threads without using locks.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你安全地将消息写入到日志从多个线程不使用锁。

trans-unit.source: **Log-File Location**
trans-unit.target: **日志文件位置**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property takes a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation> enumeration to specify one of the typical directories to write the log file to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>属性采用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation>枚举来指定要写入到日志文件的典型目录之一。

trans-unit.source: To write the log to another location, set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A> property to that location.
trans-unit.target: 若要将日志写入到另一个位置，将设置<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A>到该位置的属性。

trans-unit.source: **Log-File Name**
trans-unit.target: **日志文件名称**

trans-unit.source: The base name for the log file is specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件基名称由指定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The current log file name can be read from the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以从读取当前日志文件名称<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It is derived from several other properties and the current state of the logs in the file system.
trans-unit.target: 文件系统中，它被派生自多个其他属性和日志的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: **Log Maintenance**
trans-unit.target: **日志维护**

trans-unit.source: The minimum frequency for creating new log files is determined by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建新的日志文件的最小频率由<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the value is <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>, a new log file is created at least once every day or week, and a date stamp is incorporated into the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A> name.
trans-unit.target: 当值是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>，新的日志文件将创建在至少一次，每个每天或每周，并且日期戳将合并到<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>名称。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size (in bytes) of the log file is determined by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件的最大大小 （以字节为单位） 由<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the log file size exceeds this size, additional messages written to the log are discarded and, depending on the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果日志文件大小超过此大小，写入到日志中的其他消息是已放弃和，具体取决于<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>属性，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace%2A> property determines how much free space (in bytes) must be available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace%2A>属性确定多少可用空间 （以字节为单位） 必须可用。

trans-unit.source: This helps ensure that the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class will not consume all available disk space.
trans-unit.target: 这有助于确保<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类不会用尽所有可用磁盘空间。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property to specify the behavior of log writes when there are less than <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace%2A> bytes free.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>属性指定的日志的行为时，有写入小于<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace%2A>可用字节。

trans-unit.source: **Log-File Output Settings**
trans-unit.target: **日志文件输出设置**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.AutoFlush%2A> property specifies whether the underlying stream should be flushed automatically after each write to the log file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.AutoFlush%2A>属性指定是否基础流应自动刷新后每次写入到日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Append%2A> property specifies whether to append messages to the current log file, if allowed, or write them to a new log file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Append%2A>属性指定是否将消息追加到当前的日志文件中，如果允许，或将它们写入到新的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Delimiter%2A> property specifies the string to use for delimiting the fields within a log message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Delimiter%2A>属性指定要用于分隔日志消息中的字段的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Encoding%2A> property specifies the encoding to use when creating a new log file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Encoding%2A>属性指定要在创建新的日志文件时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: **Log-File Output**
trans-unit.target: **日志文件输出**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> methods write messages to the log file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法将消息写入日志文件。

trans-unit.source: These methods check the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> property, along with any existing logs with the same base name to determine if a new log should be created.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法检查<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>属性，以及任何现有日志具有相同基名称来确定是否应创建新的日志。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Flush%2A> method flushes any messages currently in the output buffer to the log file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Flush%2A>方法刷新当前在日志文件的输出缓冲区中的任何消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Close%2A> method closes the log file so that it can be used by other processes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Close%2A>方法关闭该日志文件，以便它可以由其他进程。

trans-unit.source: **Enabling Output**
trans-unit.target: **启用输出**

trans-unit.source: You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener.
trans-unit.target: 你必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用跟踪侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The following syntax is compiler specific.
trans-unit.target: 下面的语法是特定的编译器。

trans-unit.source: If you use compilers other than C# or [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], refer to the documentation for your compiler.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 C# 以外的编译器或[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，请参阅你的编译器的文档。

trans-unit.source: To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，或可以添加时的标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。

trans-unit.source: To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用 C# 中的跟踪，将添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时的标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。

trans-unit.source: To set the level of your listener, edit the configuration file for your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置您的侦听器的级别，请编辑你的应用程序的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameters, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application.
trans-unit.target: 在此文件中，可以添加侦听器、 将其类型设置和其参数，删除的侦听器，或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file should be formatted like the following example.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件应类似下面的示例格式化。

trans-unit.source: For this example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例正常运行，你必须提供完全限定程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何获取完全限定程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> class and sets the name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> 类的新实例并设置名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> class with the default name.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认名称初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the instance name of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class to FileLogTraceListener.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的实例名称<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>FileLogTraceListener 类。

trans-unit.source: You can access the instance name through the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问通过实例名称<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the instance object.
trans-unit.target: 实例对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> class with the supplied name.
trans-unit.target: 用提供的名称初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the instance name of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class to `name`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置的实例名称<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类到`name`。

trans-unit.source: You can access the instance name thought the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问认为的实例名称<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to append the output to the current file or write it to a new file.
trans-unit.target: 确定是将输出追加到当前文件还是将输出写入新文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Boolean" />, with <see langword="True" /> indicating that the output is appended to the current file, and <see langword="False" /> indicating that output is written to a new file.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Boolean" />，<see langword="True" /> 指示将输出追加到当前文件，<see langword="False" /> 指示将输出写入新文件。

trans-unit.source: The default setting for this property is <see langword="True" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认设置为 <see langword="True" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Append%2A> property is `False`, the output is written to a new file.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Append%2A>属性是`False`，则输出写入到新文件。

trans-unit.source: When the property is `True`, the output is appended to the current file, unless:
trans-unit.target: 当该属性是`True`，将输出追加到当前的文件，除非：

trans-unit.source: The output file is locked by another process.
trans-unit.target: 输出文件已由另一个进程锁定。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, a new log file is created with a version number that is incorporated into the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A> name.
trans-unit.target: 将合并到的版本号在此情况下，创建一个新的日志文件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>名称。

trans-unit.source: The current file size is greater than what the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize%2A> property allows.
trans-unit.target: 当前文件大小大于什么<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize%2A>属性允许。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, additional messages are discarded and, depending on the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，其他消息是已放弃和，具体取决于<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>属性，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The existing file name is out of date according to the log-creation schedule specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 现有的文件名称是根据指定的日志创建计划过期<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, a new log file is created and the date stamp is incorporated into the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A> name.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，将创建新的日志文件和日期戳将合并到<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>名称。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether or not the writing to the log file stream flushes the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 指示写入日志文件流时是否刷新缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Boolean" />, with <see langword="True" /> indicating that the stream is flushed after every write; otherwise the log entries are buffered and written more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Boolean" />，<see langword="True" /> 指示每次写入之后都刷新日志文件流；否则将缓存日志条目，这样写入会更有效率。

trans-unit.source: The default setting for this property is <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认设置为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: The `False` setting for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.AutoFlush%2A> property provides the best performance for most applications, because it is more efficient to write multiple messages to the log file at one time.
trans-unit.target: `False`设置<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.AutoFlush%2A>属性提供对于大多数应用程序的最佳性能，因为它是一次写入到日志文件的多个消息更加高效。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Flush%2A> method to flush any messages currently in the log file's output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Flush%2A>以刷新当前在日志文件中的任何消息的方法的输出缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Close%2A> method, which implicitly flushes the stream before closing the log file.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Close%2A>方法，在关闭日志文件之前隐式刷新流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name for the log files, which is used to create the full log-file name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置日志文件的基名称，该名称用于创建日志文件的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />。

trans-unit.source: The base name for the log files.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件的基名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the application's product name.
trans-unit.target: 默认为应用程序的产品名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A> property determines the base name for the log files that the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class writes to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A>属性将确定日志文件基名称<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类写入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A> property gives the current full log-file name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>属性给出的当前日志文件的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log.
trans-unit.target: 则会生成根据日志路径、 的基名称、 日期和数字来区分来自不同版本的日志。

trans-unit.source: New log files are created on an as-needed basis.
trans-unit.target: 基于根据需要创建新的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The explicit form of the full log file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where
trans-unit.target: 完整的日志文件名称的显式形式是`path` \\ `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`].log，其中

trans-unit.source: The `path` part is determined by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property and, if that property value is set to <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom>, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `path`一部分由<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>属性，如果该属性值设置为<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom>、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `baseName`一部分是基本的日志名称，指定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> is set to <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>.
trans-unit.target: `dateStamp`一部分采用格式"YYYY-月-日"，它将显示当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>设置为<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>。

trans-unit.source: If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个日志文件需要具有相同`baseName`和`dateStamp`、`iteration`部件，一个正`Integer`，添加到的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: Closes the underlying stream for the current log file and releases any resources associated with the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 关闭当前日志文件的基础流，并释放与当前流关联的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Close%2A> method explicitly, because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class manages the underlying steam.
trans-unit.target: 不需要调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Close%2A>方法显式，因为<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类管理基础流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the log file directory when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location" /> property is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom" /> 时获取或设置日志文件目录。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />, which is the name of the log-file directory.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，日志文件目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default setting for this property is the user's directory for application data.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认设置是用户的应用程序数据目录。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A> property is set, it also sets the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A>属性设置，它还将设置<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A> property will throw an exception if the directory cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A>属性将引发异常，如果目录不能解析。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delimiter used to delimit fields within a log message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在日志消息中分隔字段的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />, which is the delimiter used for fields within a log message.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，用作日志消息中字段的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The default setting for this property is the TAB character.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认设置为制表符字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Delimiter%2A> property allows you to change the default delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Delimiter%2A>属性允许您更改默认分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Determines what to do when writing to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 确定在写入日志文件时，如果可用磁盘空间小于 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace" /> 属性所指定的磁盘空间时应采取的操作。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines what to do when attempting to write to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace" /> property, or if the log file size is greater than what the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize" /> property allows.
trans-unit.target: 确定在尝试写入日志文件时，如果可用磁盘空间小于 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace" /> 属性所指定的磁盘空间，或日志文件大小大于 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize" /> 属性所允许的大小，应采取的操作。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.DiscardMessages" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.DiscardMessages" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.DiscardMessages>, the log messages are silently discarded if there is not enough reserved disk space.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.DiscardMessages>，日志消息以无提示方式将被丢弃，如果没有足够的保留的磁盘空间。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior, and it prevents simple applications from failing if the disk gets too full.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认行为，并且它可以防止简单应用程序失败的磁盘空间不足时。

trans-unit.source: More robust applications can set the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.ThrowException>, and add `Try...Catch` blocks around all code that writes to the log.
trans-unit.target: 更可靠的应用程序可以设置<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.DiskSpaceExhaustedOption.ThrowException>，并添加`Try...Catch`周围的所有代码都将写入日志块。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> releases both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="False" /> releases only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若为 <see langword="True" />，释放托管资源和非托管资源；若为 <see langword="False" />，则只释放非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Closes the underlying stream and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 关闭基础流，并可以选择释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `True`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `True` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <see langword="Dispose" /> method of the base class, <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<see langword="Dispose" />方法的基类， <see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding to use when creating a new log file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置创建新日志文件时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />, which is the encoding to use when creating a new log file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />，创建新日志文件时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />。

trans-unit.source: When appending text to an existing log file, the encoding for that file is used instead of the encoding specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Encoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 将文本追加到现有日志文件，而不是指定的编码使用该文件的编码<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Encoding%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Flushes the underlying stream that writes to the current log file.
trans-unit.target: 刷新写入当前日志文件的基础流。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Flush%2A> method to write all buffered data to the current log file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Flush%2A>方法以将所有缓冲的数据写入到当前的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current full log-file name.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前日志文件的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" />, which is the current full log-file name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，当前日志文件的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A> property gives the current full log-file name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>属性给出的当前日志文件的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log.
trans-unit.target: 则会生成根据日志路径、 的基名称、 日期和数字来区分来自不同版本的日志。

trans-unit.source: New log files are created on an as-needed basis.
trans-unit.target: 基于根据需要创建新的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The explicit form of the full log-file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where:
trans-unit.target: 日志文件的完整名称的显式形式是`path` \\ `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`].log，其中：

trans-unit.source: The `path` part is determined by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property and, if that property value is set to <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom>, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `path`一部分由<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>属性，如果该属性值设置为<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.Custom>、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `baseName`一部分是基本的日志名称，指定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.BaseFileName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `dateStamp` part has the format YYYY-MM-DD, and it is shown when <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> is <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>.
trans-unit.target: `dateStamp`一部分格式 YYYY-月-日，并且它将显示当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>是<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Daily>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.Weekly>。

trans-unit.source: If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个日志文件需要具有相同`baseName`和`dateStamp`、`iteration`部件，一个正`Integer`，添加到的文件名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom XML configuration attributes supported by the trace listener.
trans-unit.target: 获取跟踪侦听器支持的自定义 XML 配置特性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="String" /> array containing the XML configuration attributes recognized by this listener.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" /> 数组，包含此侦听器识别的 XML 配置特性。

trans-unit.source: The custom attributes for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> can be used in the XML configuration file for controlling the behavior of an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>可以用于控制的实例的行为的 XML 配置文件中使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类。

trans-unit.source: Using any other attribute causes a configuration exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用任何其他属性会导致配置异常。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether or not the host name of the logging machine should be included in the output.
trans-unit.target: 指示输出中是否应包括日志记录计算机的主机名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <see langword="True" /> if the host identifier should be included; otherwise use <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应包括主机标识符，则为 <see langword="True" />；否则为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the property to configure the behavior of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用属性来配置的行为<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets location for the log files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置日志文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation" />, which is the location for the log file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation" />，日志文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.LocalUserApplicationDirectory" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation.LocalUserApplicationDirectory" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A> property to set the log path to one of the predefined paths, determined by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Location%2A>属性将日志路径设置为预定义的路径，由之一<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileLocation>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: **Location value**
trans-unit.target: **位置值**

trans-unit.source: **Path**
trans-unit.target: **Path**

trans-unit.source: The path for the application data that is shared among all users, with the format:
trans-unit.target: 在所有用户，使用格式之间共享的应用程序数据路径：

trans-unit.source: A typical value for `BasePath` is:
trans-unit.target: 一个典型值为`BasePath`是：

trans-unit.source: C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data
trans-unit.target: C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application 数据

trans-unit.source: The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come from the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 值`CompanyName`， `ProductName`，和`ProductVersion`来自程序集。

trans-unit.source: The path for the executable file that started the application.
trans-unit.target: 启动了应用程序的可执行文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path for the application data of a user, with the format:
trans-unit.target: 具有格式的用户的应用程序数据路径：

trans-unit.source: A typical value for `BasePath` is:
trans-unit.target: 一个典型值为`BasePath`是：

trans-unit.source: C:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application Data
trans-unit.target: C:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application Data

trans-unit.source: The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come form the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 值`CompanyName`， `ProductName`，和`ProductVersion`来自程序集。

trans-unit.source: The path of the current system's temporary folder.
trans-unit.target: 当前系统的临时文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: If the string specified by <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A> is not empty, then use it as the path; otherwise use the path for the application data of a user.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的字符串<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.CustomLocation%2A>不为空，然后将其用作路径; 否则使用用户的应用程序数据的路径。

trans-unit.source: Determines which date to include in the names of the log files.
trans-unit.target: 确定要包括在日志文件名称中的日期。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption" />。

trans-unit.source: This indicates which date to include in the log-file names.
trans-unit.target: 此项指示要包括在日志文件名称中的日期。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Assign one of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption> enumeration values to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A> property to specify which date to include in the names of the log files.
trans-unit.target: 分配之一<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.LogFileCreationScheduleOption>枚举值来<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.LogFileCreationSchedule%2A>属性来指定要在日志文件的名称中包含的日期。

trans-unit.source: The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.
trans-unit.target: 日期的格式是 YYYY。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the format of the log file name, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关格式的日志文件名称的详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: **LogFileCreationSchedule value**
trans-unit.target: **LogFileCreationSchedule value**

trans-unit.source: **Date in the log file name**
trans-unit.target: **日志文件名称中的日期**

trans-unit.source: Include the current date in the log file name.
trans-unit.target: 将当前日期包括在日志文件名称中。

trans-unit.source: Do not include the date in the log file name.
trans-unit.target: 不要将日期包括在日志文件名称中。

trans-unit.source: Include the first day of the current week in the log file name.
trans-unit.target: 将当前周的第一天包括在日志文件名称中。

trans-unit.source: The week starts on Saturday.
trans-unit.target: 在星期六开始执行一周。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowed size of the log file, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所允许的日志文件的最大大小，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Long" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Long" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the maximum allowed log-file size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 这是允许的日志文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5000000.
Use this property to make sure that the log files do not grow too large.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确保日志文件执行不增长得太大。

trans-unit.source: If the log file size (in bytes) is greater than the value of this property, then when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果日志文件大小 （以字节为单位） 大于此属性的值然后当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类尝试将消息写入到日志中，消息被丢弃，则故障将是无提示或异常引发根据值<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，消息写入到日志中，如果数量的可用磁盘空间 （以字节为单位） 小于<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.ReserveDiskSpace%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to a value less than 1000.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性被设置为一个小于 1000 的值时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of free disk space, in bytes, necessary before messages can be written to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在将消息写入日志文件之前需要满足的可用磁盘空间量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Long" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Long" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the amount of free disk space necessary.
trans-unit.target: 这是所需的可用磁盘空间量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10000000.
Use this property to make sure that the log files do not completely fill the disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确保，日志文件不能完全填充该磁盘。

trans-unit.source: If the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than the value of this property, then when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果的可用磁盘空间量 （以字节为单位） 小于此属性的值然后当<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>类尝试将消息写入到日志中，消息被丢弃，则故障将是无提示或异常引发根据的值 <c2 1> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the log file size (in bytes) is greater than <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，消息写入到日志中，如果日志文件大小 （以字节为单位） 大于<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.MaxFileSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性被设置为小于 0 的值时。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace data to the output file.
trans-unit.target: 向输出文件写入跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> methods are not intended to be called by application code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。

trans-unit.source: These methods are called by members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data to output.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法调用的成员的<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>类用于写入输出的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.target: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 调用此方法的跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A name of the trace source that invoked this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法的跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数值标识符。

trans-unit.source: A format string that contains zero or more format items, which correspond to objects in the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: 一个格式字符串，其中包含零个或多个格式项，它们对应于 <c>args</c> 数组中的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Object" /> array containing zero or more objects to format.
trans-unit.target: 包含零个或多个要格式化的对象的 <see langword="Object" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 将跟踪信息、格式化对象数组和事件信息写入输出文件或流中。

trans-unit.source: This method:
trans-unit.target: 此方法：

trans-unit.source: Formats the data and context information for output.
trans-unit.target: 设置输出的数据和上下文信息的格式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new a new log file, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要创建一个新的一个新的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Writes the information to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 将信息写入日志文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on creating new log file, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的日志文件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.FullLogFileName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This table lists the output fields in the order in which they appear.
trans-unit.target: 此表列出它们的出现顺序的输出字段。

trans-unit.source: The fields are delimited by the string that the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Delimiter%2A> property specifies, and followed by a line terminator.
trans-unit.target: 由字符串分隔字段，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener.Delimiter%2A>属性指定，并且后跟行结束符。
